ActJudges Act
SubjectNational Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program ** LEAVE ** Sept. 1, 2011 to April 30, 2012
PrecisOrder granting a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to eight Judges from September 1, 2011 to April 30, 2012, in order to allow them to participate in the NATIONAL JUDICIAL STUDY LEAVE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM.
